Class GameCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • entities.Entity
        • entities.GameCharacter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, User

    public abstract class GameCharacter
extends Entity
    An abstract class Game Character, which represents a character (an animate entity)
    Version:
    May 26, 2020
    Author:
    Jeffrey Lee, Raeed Azom, Period: 1, Assignment: APCS Final Project, Sources: none
